column5: How is the 06 version of the Navionics Canadian SD card for anyone using it? I am from Alberta and it appears that there is only about 5 lakes in Alberta on it now, but I assume more are coming in the 07 version. Is it worth the money?

The 07 has more lakes. Check www.navionics.com for an updated list. I had the old one, now I bought the new one. The mapping itself hasn't really improved IMO, but there are many more lakes. BTW, the mapping on both is excellent.
